Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Jackson. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Jackson.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
